text: Ate maim pusati karana vala ham taureta di jau mere tom pahilam di hai ate maim isa la'i a'i'a ham ki kujha unham vasatu'am nu tuhade la'i halala (ja'ija) thahiravam, jo tuhade upara harama (avaidha) kara diti ga'i hai. Ate maim tuhade kola tuhade raba valom nisani lai ke a'i'a ham. Ate tusim alaha tom hi darom ate mere dase raha te calo
